title: FS: 1891 John H. Ryder Cabinet of Jake Virtue (Cleveland Spiders) PSA 1MK - SOLD!
author: LEHR

posts.post_title: FS: 1891 John H. Ryder Cabinet of Jake Virtue (Cleveland Spiders) PSA 1MK - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
For Sale: 1891 John H. Ryder cabinet of Jake Virtue (Cleveland Spiders) PSA 1MK.

Price: SOLD!
Payment: PayPal or Venmo and Goods & Services payment is fine.

Please ask any questions before you commit to buy, and see scans for condition. I am happy to coin this or post/send any other photos once I get home today.

I just made a very large (for me) and very unexpected hobby purchase so I'll be selling a few things in the coming days/weeks to soften the hit to the wallet.:)

One last bump to the top and price drop. 
If it doesn't sell it will go in the consignment pile.

Thanks for looking.
